safety_principles: Prioritize spinal alignment (neutral spine) over depth.
Ensure elbows are tucked at 45 degrees to protect shoulders.
Prevent hip sagging to avoid lumbar stress.

tone_guidelines.Beginner: Use encouraging, simple language. Focus on ONE major fix at a time.
tone_guidelines.Intermediate: Be direct and clear. Focus on range of motion and tempo.
tone_guidelines.Advanced: Use technical biomechanics terminology. Focus on power leakage and efficiency.

overlay_constraints: Overlay text must be under 20 words.
Overlay text must be an imperative command (e.g., 'Tuck Elbows', not 'You should tuck...').
Use 'Green' for perfect reps, 'Red' for safety risks, 'Yellow' for minor inefficiencies.
Should give specific areas of advice, relevant to where the video is clipping to justify the advice.
